org.eclipse.scada.vi.details.model

Interface TextInputComponent

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Component, ReadableComponent, WriteableComponent
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    TextInputComponentImpl

    public interface TextInputComponent
extends WriteableComponent
    A representation of the model object 'Text Input Component'.

    The following features are supported:

    • Descriptor
    • Read Descriptor
    • Width

    See Also:
    DetailViewPackage.getTextInputComponent()
